document.full_text: the u.s. drugs regulator said it was not recommending changes in the use of stimulants such as adderall xr and ritalin to treat hyperactivity, after a review of a study into potential heart disease risks from the drugs.
document.title: fda eases adhd drugs heart-disease concerns
